rule_config_id.description: Searchable. The GUID of the policy rule config associated with the Observation or Alert

rule_config_name.description: Searchable. The name of the policy rule config associated with the Observation or Alert, such as Defense Evasion or Advanced Scripting Prevention

rule_id.description: Searchable. ID of the rule that triggered an alert or observation; applies to INDICATOR_OF_ATTACK, INTRUSION_DETECTION_SYSTEM, HOST_BASED_FIREWALL, TAU_INTELLIGENCE, USB_DEVICE_CONTROL alerts and observations
